Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 1 Hetugocchaka » 1.2 Sahetukaduka » 1.2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 1.2.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 1.2.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Hetugocchaka
Sahetukaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
61.
163Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cha, purejāte cha, āsevane cha, kamme nava, vipāke nava, āhāre nava, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge nava, sampayutte cha, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cha, vigate cha, avigate nava. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
164Anulomaṃ.
